Interface SiteControl

public interface SiteControl

This interface specifies the methods required to manage a location and access security system at a centre. The centre will consist of a number zones connected by gates. Access through a gate is by card with a security

Method Summary
 void addCard(Card c)
          Allows a card to be added to the centre
 void addGate(Gate g)
          Allows a gate to be added to the centre
 void addToOutside()
          Moves all cards into the outside zone
 void addToOutside(Card c)
          Moves a specified card to the outside zone
 void addZone(Zone z)
          Allows a zone to be added to the centre
 java.lang.String CardsInAllZones()
          Returns a String representation of all the cards in all zones
 java.lang.String CardsInZone(Zone z)
          Returns a String representation of all the cards in the specified zone
 Zone findCard(Card c)
          Returns the zone which contains the specified card
 java.lang.String move(Card c, Gate g)
          Returns the result of a card requesting to move through a gate.A move will be successful if: the rating of the card is less than or equal to the rating of the destination zone AND the destination zone is not full AND the card has sufficient credits AND the card is in the source zone

move

public java.lang.String move(Card c,
                             Gate g)
Returns the result of a card requesting to move through a gate.A move will be successful if: the rating of the card is less than or equal to the rating of the destination zone AND the destination zone is not full AND the card has sufficient credits AND the card is in the source zone

Parameters:
c - is the card requesting the move
g - is the gate through which the card is requesting to move
Returns:
a String giving the result of the request
